## RMarkdown to filter and combine repetitive entries of the 'allData.csv' file

```{r attach-libraries}

library(tidyverse)#
library(here)
```
```



```{r load-csv}
all_data <- read.csv(here("data","allData.csv"))

names(all_data)

#"title" contain the entries we need
```



```{r check-duplicates}


#number of repeated entries
length(all_data$title)-length(unique(all_data$title))

#titles <- subset(all_data, select=c("title"))
#duplicated(titles)



```


```{r combine-duplicates}

all_data[title,duplicated(all_data$title)]

```
